data.question: In the implementation phase of System Analysis and Design, following are included :
System Implementation is necessary because :
data.op1: Human never gets it right the first time
data.op2: The deployment may change over time
data.op3: The user's needs may change over time

data.question: Which of the following is/are true about Close-out review or Post-implementation review ?
Unit implementation of software does not involve :
data.op2: linking and creation of machine code files
data.op3: writing program codes for interfaces and compilation

data.question: The process of hiding internal and implementation details and just representing major functionalities is known as :
In which phase of the System Development Life Cycle(SDLC), users or developers may discover errors or problems that cause the entire process to start over again?
Which type of maintenance deals with the problems arise during use of the software ?
Changes made periodically, to a system after it's implementation, is called :
